title: Black-hole mass estimation through accretion disk spectral fitting for high-redshift blazars
summary: This paper aims to determine black hole masses and mass accretion rates of high-redshift blazars using a Markov Chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) fitting method and the Shakura-Sunayev multi-temperature accretion disk model, compiling a sample for analysis.
usefulness_reason: Score 70 assigned because the summary explicitly states "We compiled a sample", which is a direct indication of using survey data.
